Isn't it weird that on the same day the boys announce another gig has sold out, dozens of people who claim to have already bought tickets suddenly post on here and claim they "can't make it" or that there has been a "change of plan", a "mix up with the booking" or that one of their party "has backed out" ... or some other blatantly fake reason for having tickets to sell ?  You'd have to be extremely gullible to not see that these people are all scammers, using false names, and someone elses' Facebook photos, and are hoping to con people out of their money by claiming they have spare tickets.  If you follow their links, you'll see that one person, who claims to have 4 spare tickets for London, appears to live in San Francisco.....or at least, that's where all "their" FB photos were taken.  They are all lying to you. Don't be conned.

This weeks three hour Rockshow 9- 12 midnight on GTFM or on the web at www.gtfm.co.uk or BCFM radio www.bcfmradio.com
Also on Rock Radio UK www.rock-radio.co.Uk
And Fridays on Breeze 97.7 www.breezefm.es 
and on our new network  www.roxalive.co.uk 
This week I speak to Paul Mahon from The Answer, who release a new 'comeback' album 'Sundowners', their first for 7 years with a UK tour and summer festival appearances. New music from Rival Sons, Winger, Buckcherry, Yes and Peter Gabriel.
Plus a hour of 'Irish Rock' to celebrate St Patricks Day !
Plus the usual Rock History, Rock News and Rare Track !
See you in Blackpool tomorrow.
